titles.title: Feeling Like the Azure Sky While the President is Blue / High Risk Feels Good / Uniform Badge / Ousai - Eiryou Interschool Exchange!
Kibun wa Aozora, Kaichou wa Blue / High Risk ga Kimochi Ii / Dougi no Kunshou / Ousai-Eiryou Gakuen Kouryuukai!
気分は青空 会長はブルー / ハイリスクが気持ちいい / 道着の勲章 / 桜才・英稜 学園交流会!
